traits.name: Relentless Endurance
entries: When reduced to 0 hit points, Yagra drops to 1 hit point instead (but can't do this again until she finishes a long rest).

traits.name: Pack Tactics
entries: Yagra has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of her allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

traits.name: Savage Attacks
entries: When she scores a critical hit Yagra can roll one of the weapon's damage dice and add it to the extra damage of the critical hit.

actions.name: Mace
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 5 (1d6 + 2 damage) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Heavy Crossbow
entries: Ranged atk +2 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. 5 (1d10 damage) piercing damage.
